706832f-a.text:
(1)
127-145 South Portland Ave., east side, north from north of Atlantic Ave., to Hanson Place, showing the Hanson Place Baptist Church at No. 127, at the S.E. corner of Hanson Place.
November 26, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing only the church which was dedicated in 1860. This Congregation was organized in 1854.
About 1901.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

703038f-a.text:
669-681 Atlantic Ave., north side, from and including South Portland, to and including South Oxford Streets.  All the houses are frame.

September 26, 1927

P.L. Sperr

703039f-a.text:
Atlantic Avenue, west from near Sixth Avenue, showing the W.P.A. highway and sewer project.  Also shown is the trestle of the Long Island Railroad.

1936

Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
